text: Porlieria hygrometra is an evergreen shrub growing to about 2 metres in height, endemic to Bolivia, Peru, and Chile. ==References== * Syst. Veg. Fl. Peruv. Chil. 94 1798. * The Ferns * JSTOR Isotype of Porlieria hygrometra Ruiz & Pav. hygrometra Category:Trees of Chile
title: Porlieria hygrometra
